<!-- This file was autogenerated from AnimatedLineSource.tsx do not modify -->

```tsx
import { AnimatedLineSource } from '@rnmapbox/maps';

AnimatedLineSource
```
AnimatedLineSource is a map content source that supplies an animatable GeoJSON line string to be shown on the map.

## props

  
### id

```tsx
string
```
A string that uniquely identifies the source.

  _defaults to:_ `MapboxGL.StyleSource.DefaultSourceID`

  
### lineString

```tsx
GeoJSON.LineString
```
The line data.


  
### startOffset

```tsx
number
```
The distance in meters to remove from the start of the line.

  _defaults to:_ `0`

  
### endOffset

```tsx
number
```
The distance in meters to remove from the end of the line.

  _defaults to:_ `0`

  
### animationDuration

```tsx
number
```
The duration in milliseconds to animate the offsets. If undefined or 0, changes are instantaneous.

  _defaults to:_ `undefined`

  
### children

```tsx
React.ReactElement | React.ReactElement[]
```
One or more components to render with the line data.
